pages.text: Have you ever found farming to be annoying? Well, you can craft yourself something called a Straw Golem. You place one stack of hay, then a carved pumpkin on top and boom! They harvest and replant crops for you. They'll even throw them in a chest. Make sure the chest isn't too far though. Their little legs can't walk super far! P.S. - Don't make them carry heavy things...
